EmailTemplate.subject: Follow up from voicemail (1325801803.0)
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
1024x768 Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE MicrosoftInternetExplorer4 Hi Kristin,
Thank you for following up. I apologize I will not have any time to follow up with you today, but will have a few minutes tomorrow morning or early next week that we can have a conversation and I hopefully can answer any questions you have for me.
I have included a link to my calendar below for you to schedule a convenient time that works for you and I hope to speak with you soon! https://my.timedriver.com/9TGRK
Have a great evening, Nicolette
___________________________________ Nicolette Taylor Consultant Services Advisor MBO Partners
t: 703.793.6281 f: 703.793.6456 e: ntaylor@mbopartners.com w: www.mbopartners.com
Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed. If you have received this email in error please notify postmaster@mbopartners.com and permanently delete the e-mail and files.
